intro:
影で　隠れている　謎の　女の人が　道を　さえぎる。
何か　不安に　なる……
speaker: 女の人
intro_dialogue: あなたの　未来たちも　過去たちも　全て　見えます。$我が子よ、　見えますか？
description:
女の人の　言葉は　頭に　響いています。　一人の声じゃなくて、　全ての　異世界と　時間軸から　数多な　声々でした。　クラッと　めまいがして、　あの質問が　頭で　めぐります……

@[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{「あなたの　未来たちも　過去たちも　全て　見えます。　我が子よ、　見えますか？」}

1.label: 「見えます。」
1.tooltip: @[SUMMARY_GREEN]{(?) 手持ちポケモンに影響}
1.selected:
Her hand reaches out to touch you,
and everything goes black.$Then...@d{64} You see everything.
Every timeline, all your different selves,
 past and future.$Everything that has made you,
everything you will become...@d{64}
1.cutscene:
You see your Pokémon,@d{32} converging from
every reality to become something new...@d{64}
1.dream_complete:
When you awaken, the woman - was it a woman or a ghost? - is gone...$.@d{32}.@d{32}.@d{32}$Your Pokémon team has changed...
Or is it the same team you've always had?

2.label: Quickly Leave
2.selected: You tear your mind from a numbing grip, and hastily depart.$When you finally stop to collect yourself, you check the Pokémon in your team.$For some reason, all of their levels have decreased!
